description: Creates NEAR wallets on testnet, verifies wallet connection, and checks token ownership on 1000fans.testnet.
Mints and transfers NFTs on 1000fans.testnet for 1000fans platform access.
Verifies embedded test.mp3 and passes it to storage-agent after user confirmation.
Uploads audio files from upload-agent to IPFS and stores CIDs on the NEAR blockchain.
